gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `IntangibleAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_IntangibleAssetsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_IntangibleAssetsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_IntangibleAssetsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_IntangibleAssetsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice` MUST NOT be reported, because `IntangibleAssetsCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence2_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence2_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence2_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence2_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsCostPrice` MUST NOT be reported, because `IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T4_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_IntangibleAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_IntangibleAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsIntangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T3_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
